title: Authors and Citation
text: Michael Bücker. Author, maintainer. Niels Schlüsener. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Bücker M, Schlüsener N (2026). MSBStatsData: Data Sets Courses Münster School Business. R package version 0.1.0.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MSBStatsData: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business},   author = {Michael Bücker and Niels Schlüsener},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.1.0}, }

what: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
title: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
text: MSBStatsData provides curated teaching datasets statistics data science courses Münster School Business FH Münster. package designed reproducible exercises solutions R, data works well across core topics like frequencies, location dispersion measures, association, regression, introductory time series analysis.

title: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
code: library(MSBStatsData)  data("cinema_visitors") head(cinema_visitors)  data("de_energy_prices") subset(   de_energy_prices,   series %in% c("electricity", "transport_fuels") )[1:6, c("date", "series", "price_index_2015_100")]

title: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
text: cinema_visitors bvb_rankings website_dwell checkout_times research_ads env_survey_eu10 union_satisfaction union_satisfaction_ind sport_occupation sport_occupation_ind florida_sentencing florida_sentencing_ind tv_gender tv_gender_ind car_occupation car_occupation_ind ms_bike_sites ms_bike_hourly_2025 ms_bike_hourly_2025_city nrw_population de_elections de_energy_prices

title: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business
text: data objects small classroom-friendly. helpful, aggregated individual-level versions provided. Data sources documented respective dataset help pages (?dataset_name). GitHub releases may ahead current CRAN version.

what: MSBStatsData: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business — MSBStatsData-package
title: MSBStatsData: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business — MSBStatsData-package
text: Provides sample data sets used statistics data science courses Münster School Business. datasets refer different business topics also domains, e.g. sports, traffic, etc.

title: MSBStatsData: Data Sets for Courses at the Münster School of Business — MSBStatsData-package
text: Maintainer: Michael Bücker michael.buecker@fh-muenster.de (ORCID) Authors: Niels Schlüsener niels.schluesener@fh-muenster.de

title: Borussia Dortmund final rankings (1988-2022) — bvb_rankings
text: dataset contains Borussia Dortmund's final Bundesliga ranking season 1988 2022.

title: Borussia Dortmund final rankings (1988-2022) — bvb_rankings
Borussia Dortmund final rankings (1988-2022) — bvb_rankings
text: tibble 35 rows 2 variables: year Calendar year season endpoint. ranking Final Bundesliga ranking (1 = best rank).

title: Car brand by occupation (aggregated) — car_occupation
text: dataset contains counts preferred car brands occupation.

title: Car brand by occupation (aggregated) — car_occupation
Car brand by occupation (aggregated) — car_occupation
text: tibble 4 rows 6 variables: occupation Occupation category. audi Count Audi drivers. bmw Count BMW drivers. opel Count Opel drivers. vw Count VW drivers. total Row total.

title: Car brand by occupation (individual-level) — car_occupation_ind
text: dataset contains one row per surveyed person occupation car brand.

title: Car brand by occupation (individual-level) — car_occupation_ind
Car brand by occupation (individual-level) — car_occupation_ind
text: tibble 500 rows 2 variables: occupation Occupation category. brand Car brand category.

title: Checkout service times — checkout_times
text: dataset contains service times (seconds) 50 consecutive customers supermarket checkout.

title: Checkout service times — checkout_times
Checkout service times — checkout_times
text: tibble 50 rows 1 variable: service_time_seconds Observed service time seconds.

title: Cinema visitors over 100 days — cinema_visitors
text: dataset contains absolute frequency distribution cinema visitors per day recorded 100 days.

title: Cinema visitors over 100 days — cinema_visitors
Cinema visitors over 100 days — cinema_visitors
text: tibble 11 rows 2 variables: viewers Number visitors counted day. days Number days respective visitor count.

what: Bundestag election results by federal state — de_elections
title: Bundestag election results by federal state — de_elections
text: Party-level second-vote results German federal state 2021 Bundestag election result table (official publication format).

title: Bundestag election results by federal state — de_elections
Bundestag election results by federal state — de_elections
text: tibble 377 rows 6 variables: election_year Election year. state_code Two-digit federal state code. state Federal state name. party Party label official result file. votes Number second votes. vote_share Second-vote share percent.

what: Monthly consumer energy price indices in Germany — de_energy_prices
title: Monthly consumer energy price indices in Germany — de_energy_prices
text: Monthly Harmonised Index Consumer Prices (HICP) sub-indices selected energy categories Germany (index base 2015 = 100).

title: Monthly consumer energy price indices in Germany — de_energy_prices
Monthly consumer energy price indices in Germany — de_energy_prices
text: tibble 480 rows 4 variables: date Month observation. series Energy category series label. coicop COICOP classification code. price_index_2015_100 Price index value (2015 = 100).

what: Data of competition results of decathlon for men — decathlon
title: Data of competition results of decathlon for men — decathlon
text: decathlon men combined event athletics consisting 10 track field events:  100 metres, 400 metres, 1500 metres, 110 metre hurdles, long jump, high jump, pole vault, discus throw, javelin throw, shotput.

title: Data of competition results of decathlon for men — decathlon
Data of competition results of decathlon for men — decathlon
text: tibble 7,958 rows 10 variables: race100m dbl result 100m race seconds longjump dbl result long jump meters shotput dbl result shot put meters highjump dbl result high jump meters race400m dbl result 400m race seconds race110mhurdles dbl result 110m hurdles race seconds discus dbl result discus throw meters polevault dbl result pole valut meters javelinthrow dbl result javelin throw meters race1500m dbl result 1500m race seconds

title: Environmental survey sample (EU, n = 10) — env_survey_eu10
text: dataset contains responses 10 sampled persons EU-wide survey environmental protection.

title: Environmental survey sample (EU, n = 10) — env_survey_eu10
Environmental survey sample (EU, n = 10) — env_survey_eu10
text: tibble 10 rows 4 variables: age Age respondent. gender Gender respondent. income_eur Monthly net income EUR. environmental_protection Attitude towards environmental protection.

what: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (aggregated) — florida_sentencing
title: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (aggregated) — florida_sentencing
text: dataset contains contingency table sentencing outcomes defendant skin color.

title: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (aggregated) — florida_sentencing
Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (aggregated) — florida_sentencing
text: tibble 3 rows 4 variables: defendant_skin_color Defendant skin color total row. death_penalty Count death penalty sentences. other_sentence Count sentences. total Row total.

what: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (individual-level) — florida_sentencing_ind
title: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (individual-level) — florida_sentencing_ind
text: dataset contains one row per case defendant skin color sentence category.

title: Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (individual-level) — florida_sentencing_ind
Florida murder sentencing by defendant skin color (individual-level) — florida_sentencing_ind
text: tibble 326 rows 2 variables: defendant_skin_color Defendant skin color. sentence Sentence category.

title: HR data — hr_data
text: dataset contains human resources data footwear company. entity dataset represents one employee total six attributes.

title: HR data — hr_data
HR data — hr_data
text: tibble 1,200 rows 6 variables: position [fct] Position employee company. working_hours [dbl] Contracted working hours employee per week. salary [dbl] Monthly salary employee. hourly_wage [dbl] Hourly compensation employee. department [fct] Department employee employed. sick_days [dbl] Sick days employee period observed.

title: Data of Marketing expenses — marketing_expenses
text: dataset contains product-, marketing- sales data 235 shoes footwear company. entity represents one shoe, listed product data, marketing data sales data total 14 variables.

title: Data of Marketing expenses — marketing_expenses
Data of Marketing expenses — marketing_expenses
text: tibble 235 rows 14 variables: marketing_expenses [dbl] Expenses marketing activities shoe. customers_reached [dbl] Estimated number customers reached footwear marketing activity shoe. negative_reactions [dbl] Number negative reactions marketing activities shoe. price [dbl] Retail price shoe. price_segment [fct] Price segment shoe. number_of_sizes [dbl] Number sizes shoe available. target_customer [fct] Gender shoe intended . rating_testers [dbl] Average product rating test customers shoe. rating_customers [dbl] Average product rating real customers shoe. color_most_sold [fct] Color shoe selled often. return_rate [dbl] Rate often shoe returned customer. sales_volume [dbl] Number sales shoe. rank_rating_customers [dbl] Attribute 'rating_customers', divided ranks calculation correlation coefficient according Spearman. rank_price_segment [dbl] Attribute 'price_segment', divided ranks calculation correlation coefficient according Spearman.

what: Hourly bike counts in Muenster by station (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025
title: Hourly bike counts in Muenster by station (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025
text: Hourly totals derived 15-minute open data published City Muenster available bike counting stations 2025.

title: Hourly bike counts in Muenster by station (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025
Hourly bike counts in Muenster by station (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025
text: tibble 210,240 rows 4 variables: station_id Station identifier. station_name Readable station name. datetime_hour Hour timestamp (local time, Europe/Berlin). bikes_total Total counted bikes hour.

what: Hourly citywide bike counts in Muenster (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025_city
title: Hourly citywide bike counts in Muenster (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025_city
text: Citywide hourly totals aggregated across available bike counting stations Muenster 2025.

title: Hourly citywide bike counts in Muenster (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025_city
Hourly citywide bike counts in Muenster (2025) — ms_bike_hourly_2025_city
text: tibble 8,760 rows 2 variables: datetime_hour Hour timestamp (local time, Europe/Berlin). bikes_total Total counted bikes across available stations.

what: Bike counting sites in Muenster — ms_bike_sites
title: Bike counting sites in Muenster — ms_bike_sites
text: Metadata selected public bike counting stations Muenster.

title: Bike counting sites in Muenster — ms_bike_sites
Bike counting sites in Muenster — ms_bike_sites
text: tibble 24 rows 2 variables: station_id Station identifier used source repository. station_name Readable station name.

title: Population by NRW districts — nrw_population
text: Annual population counts NUTS-3 districts North Rhine-Westphalia (NRW), Germany.

title: Population by NRW districts — nrw_population
Population by NRW districts — nrw_population
text: tibble 318 rows 5 variables: year Reference year. nuts3_code NUTS-3 district code. district_name District name. district_type District type (urban rural district). population Total resident population.

what: Monthly research and advertising spending — research_ads
title: Monthly research and advertising spending — research_ads
text: dataset contains monthly spending company research advertising (thousand EUR).

title: Monthly research and advertising spending — research_ads
Monthly research and advertising spending — research_ads
text: tibble 12 rows 3 variables: month Month abbreviation. research Research spending thousand EUR. advertising Advertising spending thousand EUR.

title: Salary trend data — salary_trends
text: Dataset containing average salary footwear company's employees 10 years.

title: Salary trend data — salary_trends
Salary trend data — salary_trends
text: tibble 10 rows 2 variables: year [dbl] Year record. avg_salary [dbl] Average salary corresponding year.

title: Shipping error data — shipping_errors
text: Dataset recording errors shipment type delivery requested customer process.

title: Shipping error data — shipping_errors
Shipping error data — shipping_errors
text: tibble 576 rows 2 variables: error [fct] Indicator whether error appeared shipment. shipping [fct] Shipment method requested customer.

title: Sorting times — sorting_times
text: dataset contains throughput times machine recorded order compare manufacturer's specifications.

title: Sorting times — sorting_times
Sorting times — sorting_times
text: tibble 60 rows 1 variable: sorting_time [dbl] Recorded time (seconds) required machine sorting individual parts.

title: Sport activity by occupation (aggregated) — sport_occupation
text: dataset contains counts sport activity frequencies occupation.

title: Sport activity by occupation (aggregated) — sport_occupation
Sport activity by occupation (aggregated) — sport_occupation
text: tibble 5 rows 4 variables: occupation Occupation category. never Count sport activity. occasionally Count occasional sport activity. regularly Count regular sport activity.

title: Sport activity by occupation (individual-level) — sport_occupation_ind
text: dataset contains one row per surveyed person occupation sport activity frequency.

title: Sport activity by occupation (individual-level) — sport_occupation_ind
Sport activity by occupation (individual-level) — sport_occupation_ind
text: tibble 1,000 rows 2 variables: occupation Occupation category. sport_activity Sport activity frequency category.

what: TV viewing time by gender (aggregated) — tv_gender
title: TV viewing time by gender (aggregated) — tv_gender
text: dataset contains grouped TV viewing counts gender.

title: TV viewing time by gender (aggregated) — tv_gender
TV viewing time by gender (aggregated) — tv_gender
text: tibble 3 rows 4 variables: tv_time_group Grouped weekly TV viewing time total row. men Count men. women Count women. total Row total.

what: TV viewing time by gender (individual-level) — tv_gender_ind
title: TV viewing time by gender (individual-level) — tv_gender_ind
text: dataset contains one row per person gender grouped weekly TV viewing time.

title: TV viewing time by gender (individual-level) — tv_gender_ind
TV viewing time by gender (individual-level) — tv_gender_ind
text: tibble 320 rows 2 variables: gender Gender surveyed person. tv_time_group Grouped weekly TV viewing time.

what: Satisfaction with a union agreement — union_satisfaction
title: Satisfaction with a union agreement — union_satisfaction
text: dataset contains contingency table member satisfaction new agreement two unions (plus totals).

title: Satisfaction with a union agreement — union_satisfaction
Satisfaction with a union agreement — union_satisfaction
text: tibble 3 rows 6 variables: union Union identifier total row. very_satisfied Count satisfied respondents. satisfied Count satisfied respondents. dissatisfied Count dissatisfied respondents. very_dissatisfied Count dissatisfied respondents. total Row total.

what: Satisfaction with a union agreement (individual-level) — union_satisfaction_ind
title: Satisfaction with a union agreement (individual-level) — union_satisfaction_ind
text: dataset contains information union_satisfaction, expanded individual-level observations one row per surveyed person.

title: Satisfaction with a union agreement (individual-level) — union_satisfaction_ind
Satisfaction with a union agreement (individual-level) — union_satisfaction_ind
text: tibble 1,000 rows 2 variables: union Union identifier. satisfaction Satisfaction category agreement.

title: Grouped website dwell times — website_dwell
text: dataset contains grouped dwell-time frequencies sample 100 website users.

title: Grouped website dwell times — website_dwell
Grouped website dwell times — website_dwell
text: tibble 5 rows 2 variables: dwell_time_interval_min Interval dwell time minutes. persons Number persons interval.
